comments.text: Bug 704230 introduced a workaround for only EN-us.  What we want to do is extract the file's contents from the jar directly into memory.  Alternatively we can do what bug 695699 or 696555 attempts.

comments.raw_text: Moving all open Core::Widget: Android bugs to GeckoView::General (then the triage owner of GeckoView will decide which ones are valuable and which ones should be closed).
